website_summaries.verdict: A post-style grill with handles that make it portable so you can take it anywhere.
pros: Quick delivery at a good price
Can also be used on land
Folding legs create a carrying handle
cons: Not as sturdy as other grills on the market

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The burner was not manufactured properly which caused the flames to not be dispersed evenly across the whole burner. Caused high flames where the gas comes out of the bottle. Substandard material. Very light weight, but too light weight material. Better off just getting a stand and placing a top on the stand and getting a portable grill. That's what we had to do at the last minute. Would like a refund due to the faulty cheaply made product. For this kind of money you should get something a lot nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSAPOINTED IN THE DESIGN QUALITY....
customer_reviews.text: IT'S OK... THE WIND BLOWS IT OUT EASY, AND IT DOESN'T HEAT UP WELL... IT'S VERY SLOW TO HEAT.. THE GREASE DRIPPS OUT FROM UNDER IT...( NOT COOL ! ) I AM SO HAPPY THAT MY MARINA DOES NOT ALLOW GAS GRILLS TO BE USED ON THE BOAT..! I WOULD HAVE HAD SUCH A MESS...!! ALL OVER MY NEW BOAT'S, NEW DECK CARPETS, MY BOAT DECK AND EVERYWHERE...!!!! VERY POORLY DESIGNED..! VERY DISSAPPOINTED..!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Does not like wind.
customer_reviews.text: Decent well built grill but does not like any kind of wind and does not heat very evenly .
customer_reviews.author: paul colavecchia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Open boxed and several parts were missing including the burners and gas hook up. Very small cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kim and Chris Coons

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The regulator is junk it does not send enough fuel. The wind constantly blows out the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This BBQ has been great, we have used it the past two weekends ...
customer_reviews.text: This BBQ has been great, we have used it the past two weekends on the boat. its easy to store and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: POLE NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: The picture showed it with a mounting pole... however it didn’t come with the pole... I feel this is misleading...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time. Works great. Really glad i bought this grill. Had 6 brats and 8 dogs cooking at same time and still had room. Fits great at rear of pontoon.
customer_reviews.author: MFJ

customer_reviews.title: Grill did not come with base and pole like in this picture
customer_reviews.text: Grill did not come with base and pole like in this picture. Like the grill how do you get a base and pole.
customer_reviews.author: jeff Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty/ high quality. It will do for the price and the application.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Had to line with foil so it would stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Regulator went bad after only one use ! Return window is not long enough for something that is typically seasonal use!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wright

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use it went up very quickly and even kept the wind from blowing out the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time and would not relight. A lot of money for something that already needs fixed
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Reed

customer_reviews.title: Grill works well and easy on gas
customer_reviews.text: Pedestal became stuck in bottom of grill on first use. Grill works well and easy on gas.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great boat grill
customer_reviews.text: NIce little grill for our pontoon boat. Easy to install and a nice surface area for four or five people.
customer_reviews.author: wordmavin

customer_reviews.title: Went to Lowes and bought one a lot better for 59
customer_reviews.text: over priced and the so called legs that is suppose to support the grill when not on the poll, is awful. It falls on you when your grilling and I have been burnt by the grill when this happens. Went to Lowes and bought one a lot better for 59.00.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our boat looks good and works great
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Heat issues in wind.
customer_reviews.text: Not great on a windy day. Heats well out of the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Real Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality especially the grill. Poor assembly instructions, parts in the package that are not listed. Definitely would not recommend this product especially for the cost. There was no contact information for the company, no help number, no serial number, etc.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gene Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little grill
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good and small portable grill for our pontoon boat. This does it all!!! Love that you can mount the grill onto the boat without sacrificing space! Totally collapsible too so you can grill on the table or anywhere. Very satisfied and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ronne Jo Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Father's day present for my dad for out on the boat. His eyes literally lit up when he opened it. It was easily assembled and we were grilling in no time. The boat stays parked at the marina and they take the grill home with them so no one steals it, the grill part comes off the post easily and goes right back on making it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: SBower

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: makes grilling on the boat a piece of cake. easy to install and use. uses tiny can of propane, but keep a couple spare. you can go through a single can in a single cook out, so be ready to spin on a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in the Pontoon!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our pontoon and LOVE it. It mounts directly on the post that the back table near the captain's chair uses. It was easy to assemble (coming from a guy who hates to assemble things) is easy to setup on the boat, and stores directly underneath one of the chairs. Looking forward to many great cookouts this summer! As an aside: A friend purchased a similar grill and tried to mount it on one of the railings - overhanging the water. It ended with the grill at the bottom of the lake. So I recommend NOT mounting on the raining and sticking with the post inside the boat - assuming you have a pontoon for this.
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: Use a long match to light.
customer_reviews.text: First time is used it I did not notice the burner did not light all the way, only part of it lit. So as you can imagine it did not work very well. I decided to give it a second chance and realized you need to run a flame all the way around the burner to make sure it lights all around. It worked great, I use it on my boat and it is stable using the pedestal mount. I have used it several times for cooking burgers and dogs works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey James Poe

customer_reviews.title: Every boat needs this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, grills awesome. Weather on the boat or land. Compact strong, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not too impressed with the thing . 1,For one the pole does not fit into a regular table/hole .I comes with it;s own and means you have to take your table one out and screww theirs in. If you leave theirs in as your running the boat water comes up through it unless you go really slow. 2, After you cook and let it cool down it;s very hard to take the pole out from the base of the grill. 3, It cooks alright and the only thing I have to say is it all fits into the inside of the grill after use
customer_reviews.author: TDE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my party barge
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but tubes tend to stick together so disassembly becomes difficult. Used a little WD40 and now disassembly mush easier. Use it all the time on the party barge. Good quality, expect to get many years of use form this grill.
customer_reviews.author: philip packard

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay lit.
customer_reviews.text: This barbecue does no have enough flame to even cook a hot dog. The flame blows out if there is even a hint of wind don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Conner

customer_reviews.title: Did not really it. But decided to keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not really it. But decided to keep it, because I have to pay shipping again to return it and I have to pay 15% restocking fee. Grease is coming out of the pole, so hard to keep the flame on.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the propane insert to grill is really hard to get threaded
customer_reviews.author: ward

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Great grill for my Sea Ray boat. Works great. Easy to set up and disassemble. Only down side is its a bit hard to get the fire going but once its on it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Worldwide Sellers

customer_reviews.title: DELUXE PROPANE GRILL
customer_reviews.text: BOUGTH THIS FOR OUR SON TO USE WHEN HE AND HIS FAMILY GO CAMPING. WE BOUGHT THEM ONE 10 YEARS AGO AND HAD GOOD SERVICE. WE BOUGHT THIS TO REPLACE HIS OLD ONE. 10 YEARS IS GOOD SERVICE FOR A GRILL FOR CAMPING.
customer_reviews.author: Ranell Love-Martin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: very poor purchase I'm so disappointed!!! didn't come with the screws to mount the pole stand to my boat. Has no grease catcher what so ever Do you think I want grease running all over my Boat??? for the money this cost it is a 15 dollar Walmart grill on a pole,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lunch on the water
customer_reviews.text: hope the person i gave it to uses it and hope its easy to put together, if so then score
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Wesley Tinnell

customer_reviews.title: Very useful item
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd season that I'll be using it. After every season I bring it home and thoroughly clean it including the regulator. I actually blow it out with an airhose and that does the trick with the distribution of the propane. Yes, at times the flame will get blown out but if you rotate it away from the wind that really helps. I really don't have anything bad to say about this little grill. I have it mounted on the rear of my pontoon and is out of the way of everything.......
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough for hotdogs etc. Biggest complaint is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for hotdogs etc. Biggest complaint is that although they make replacement parts, there is no place to buy them
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Polly

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay lit maybe a defective one but I'm returning and going back to a Magna Boat grill.
customer_reviews.author: chris smetana

product_meta.title: Springfield Marine 1940052 Deluxe Barbeque Grill
product_meta.description: The Springfield BBQ Grill is a great addition for the boating enthusiast! With a 12,000 BTU rating this grill can be used in your boat with included mounting post. When you want to BBQ on land simply remove from the post and it converts to a table top grill. WIth 189 square inches of grill cooking surface there is plenty of room to feed a crowd. The top of the BBQ lid even works as a solid griddle with a 130 square inches of cook surface.
feature_bullets: Series deluxe Grill w/thread-lock 29 inch post
Grilling/cooking service area features 189 sq. In. Grill cooking surface w/130 sq. In. Griddle surface on top of lid
Use w/1 lb. Propane Tank (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars66 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
